language.name: LOGINWITHGUEST
language.value: Login with your Managana account. You may also use your Google or Yahoo accounts by clicking the logos. Managana Will not receive your password for Google and Yahoo: you'll be redirected to their site to login.

language.name: LOGINNOGUEST
language.value: Please provide your e-mail and password to access Managana.

language.name: COMMENTWAIT
language.value: Your comment was received and is waiting for approval.

language.name: REMOTECOMMENTSENT
language.value: Thank you for your comment. It will be available at this list as soon as it is evaluated.

language.name: REMOTEINFOCONNECTIONERROR
language.value: The Managana player was not found, check the public key and try again

language.name: REMOTERATELOGIN
language.value: you must login to rate content

language.name: MAILNEWBODY
language.value:
Hi, [NAME], and welcome to Managana!
A new account was set to you with the following data:
e-mail address: [EMAIL] password: [PASS]
You can access the Managana content here: [VIEWLINK]
You can also access the Managana editor by clicking on this link: [LINK]

language.name: REMOTEINFOCONNECTCIRRUS
language.value: looking for player over the Internet...

language.name: MAILNEWBODYSUBSCRIBER
language.value:
Hi, [NAME], and welcome to Managana!
A new account was set to you with the following data:
e-mail address: [EMAIL] password: [PASS]
You can access the Managana content by clicking on this link: [VIEWLINK]

language.name: REMOTEINFOPUBLICNOKEY
language.value: Provide the presentation key to connect

language.name: LOGINWAIT
language.value: Please wait while the chosen authentication service is open...

language.name: READERERROR
language.value: The communication with the server failed.

language.name: OFFLINEINFOERROR
language.value: Sorry, the information about the selected content is not available.

language.name: REMOTENOPEER
language.value: The peer network could not be initialized. Remote controls won't work. Check your Flash Player settings to enable peer network for this site.

language.name: REMOTEINFONOSTREAMDESCRIPTION
language.value: No extra information about the current stream.

language.name: OFFLINEWIFI
language.value: Before start downloding, please check your web connection. Wi-fi is always preferred since the content size may lead to mobile connection plans charges.

language.name: NOWEBERROR
language.value: No Internet connection detected and no offline content available. The application can't run.

language.name: LOGINOPENCANCEL
language.value: The authentication was cancelled. Would you like to try again?

language.name: LOGINFAIL
language.value: The authentication failed. Would you like to try again?

language.name: OFFLINEDOWNERROR
language.value: Error found while downloading the requested content. Please try again.

language.name: LOGINOK
language.value: Welcome, [NAME]. You have successfully validated your account. Click on the button below to return to Managana.

language.name: OFFLINEDOWNMSG
language.value: Downloading content... You may safely close this window and keep using Managana. Your download will continue in background. If you exit Managana the download will be paused and resumed when the application is restarted.

language.name: MAILRECOVERBODY
language.value:
You asked for a password change for your Managana account. In order to complete the process, just access the link below:
[LINK]
If you did not ask for this, don't worry. Just ignore this message.

language.name: LOGINRECOVERABOUT
language.value: In order to change your Managana password, provide your e-mail address and the new password below. The change will only be completed after you access your inbox and follow the new password validation instructions.

language.name: REMOTECOMMENTERROR
language.value: Error while sending the comment, please try again.

language.name: RECOVERMESSAGEERROR
language.value: The information for password change was not correct. Please try to recover or change your password again. If the problem persists, contact the system administrator.

language.name: REMOTECOMMENTSLOGIN
language.value: you must login to add comments

language.name: LOGINREQUIRED
language.value: You must login before rating or commenting streams.

language.name: OFFLINENEWAVAILABLE
language.value: Updates found for your current offline content. Please check the content manager.

language.name: REMOTEINFOLOGINABOUTERROR
language.value: User login error, please try again

language.name: REMOTEINFOWAIT
language.value: looking for player at local network...

language.name: OFFLINEUPDABOUT
language.value: You can check updates for this content and also remove it from you offline collection. If you delete it, you'll need to download the entire content again to access it offline.

language.name: LEAPERROR
language.value: errors found while calibrating the Leap Motion device

language.name: LEAPPOINTTL
language.value: point to the top left corner of the window for a while

language.name: LOGINRECOVERNOTFOUND
language.value: The provided e-mail address was not found at our database. Please try again.

language.name: LOGINERROR
language.value: Your login was not recognized. Please try again.

language.name: LEAPPOINTBR
language.value: point to the bottom right corner of the window for a while

language.name: LOGINRECOVEROK
language.value: Your e-mail address was found at our database. You'll soon receive a message on your inbox with an aditional step to validate the new password.
